name: Introduction to Calculus
description: A course introducing students to the basics of calculus, including derivatives and integrals.

name: Calculus I
description: A course on the foundational principles of calculus, including derivatives and integrals.

name: Calculus II
description: An intermediate course on the principles of calculus, including series, parametric equations, and polar coordinates.

name: Calculus III
description: A further advanced course on the principles of calculus, including multi-variable calculus and vector calculus.
